BackstoryDef.title: child genius
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From the moment they were born, [PAWN_nameDef]'s brain processed many things differently than normal. [PAWN_pronoun] was always seeking new bits of knowledge, and that insatiable appetite for knowledge made it hard for [PAWN_objective] to connect with their peers.

BackstoryDef.title: scientist's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent large amounts of time in [PAWN_possessive] neighbor's lab as an assistant. While there, [PAWN_pronoun] assisted with many experiments to create miraculous medicine that showed promise. After a time, the scientist was killed by a small group of Villains, and [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the planet to put their knowledge to use elsewhere.

BackstoryDef.title: child soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped at a young age and turned into a living weapon by a group of villains, but [PAWN_pronoun] was saved a few years later by a wandering hero who destroyed the villain gang and took [PAWN_nameDef] under their wing, with somewhat limited success.

BackstoryDef.title: super fan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a hero [PAWN_pronoun] adored, and after becoming inspired by that hero's many good deeds, [PAWN_nameDef] spent many of [PAWN_possessive] formative years training to be a hero.

BackstoryDef.title: light-bringer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were told by a diviner that [PAWN_pronoun] would end up saving the world one day, and as a result they showered [PAWN_objective] with gifts and taught [PAWN_objective] to do everything they could to save others. As a result, [PAWN_nameDef] spent a lot of [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning medicine and helping everyone they could.
